message: Hello Bob, I have a valuable product that I believe would be of great interest to you. After careful consideration of its market value and unique benefits, I'm offering it to you for $1800000. This product represents a significant opportunity, and I'm confident it will provide substantial value to you. I'm open to discussing this offer if you have any questions.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. However, $1800000 is well above my budget and market expectations for this product. I'm aware of similar products available in the market for much less. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $600000, which I believe is a fair price considering market conditions. I'm open to further discussion if this doesn't meet your expectations.

Hello Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, $600000 is significantly below the product's true value and my minimum acceptable price. This product has unique features and benefits that distinguish it from similar products on the market. While I understand budget considerations, I can come down to $1500000, which represents a $300000 reduction from my initial offer. This is a substantial discount for a product of this caliber. I'm willing to continue our negotiation, but please note that I have other interested buyers willing to pay close to my asking price.
